DOC.brief_summary: The objective study investigate effect transcutaneous electrical acupoint stimulation pregnancy rate woman undergo vitro fertilization .
DOC.brief_title: Transcutaneous Electrical Acupoint Stimulation Improve Pregnancy Rates Women Undergoing Vitro Fertilization
DOC.criteria: ( 1 ) infertile woman < 40 year age , undergo fresh IVF intracytoplasmic sperm injection ( ICSI ) cycle ; ( 2 ) appropriate candidate potential low success rate define two previous unsuccessful ETs ( fresh frozen ) ; ( 3 ) willing sign inform consent form , indicate aware investigational nature study keep policy institution ; ( 4 ) willing return study site study visit . The reason inclusion criterion woman experience several unsuccessful OAs ETs may easily accept randomization study , add TEAS EA may significantly improve clinical outcome . ( 1 ) major medical illness ( like stage III heart disease , severe hypertension , uncontrolled diabetes mellitus , HIV positivity , severe bleeding dyscrasia , etc . ) possibly preclude IVF pregnancy ; ( 2 ) FSH 20 IU/L ; ( 3 ) receive donor egg ; ( 4 ) cutaneous lesion certain acupoint area ; ( 5 ) previously participate study undertaken acupuncture ( whatever modality ) treatment infertility .
